name: EW1.SettingsIcons (Carbon)
author: Evelyn (ev_ynw)
description:
Apply with Snowboard (with Settings Icons extension) *RECOMMENDED* / iThemer

Separated into 2 sub-themes - Settings Icons (stock) & Tweaks (tweak thumbnails)

Installed to /Library/Themes

You may need to do some customizing / renaming of image files. Detailed tutorial here: https://evelynynw.wordpress.com/2020/05/02/ui-theming-101-for-dummies/

1.1: Added @2x images for iP6, 7, 8, SE etc.
1.0-1: Made package name consistent as EW Settings Icons
